web_snippets: Ed Atkins (born 1982) is a British contemporary artist best known for his video art and poetry. He is currently based in Cophenhagen.
Biography. Ed Atkins (born 1982) is a British contemporary artist best known for his video art and poetry. He is currently based in Cophenhagen.
Ed Atkins is currently producing new video work for his Tate Britain retrospective, the centrepiece of which is a feature-length film co-written with the poet ...
